name: Boxer Crab
description:
Hello everyone!

Toches Games is made up of a group of 4 people (at the time of writing this), this is our first participation in a Jam and our first Video Game on this platform, we are a group of young people still new to video game development but passionate about all this, we hope you like our little game and leave us your comments below. Greetings gamers.

Instructions:

The game consists of who hits faster, you are the red crab, every so often an item appears on one of the sides and you must quickly press the right or left arrow on your keyboard to take it, the crab that takes the item will attack.

Items:
Blue (defense): Allows you to protect yourself from the next attack of the opposing crab.
Red (attack): Attacks strongly.
Green (health): Recovers life.
